psidev.psi.mi.filemakers.xsd
Class AbstractXsdTreeStruct

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      psidev.psi.mi.filemakers.xsd.AbstractXsdTreeStruct
Direct Known Subclasses:
XsdTreeStructImpl, XsdTreeStructImpl
public abstract class AbstractXsdTreeStruct
extends java.util.Observable

This Class creates and manages a tree representation of a XML schema

Author:
Arnaud Ceol, University of Rome "Tor Vergata", Mint group, arnaud@cbm.bio.uniroma2.it

treeModel

public javax.swing.tree.DefaultTreeModel treeModel

autoDuplicate

public boolean autoDuplicate
if this variable is setted to true (by the constructor) while expanding a node, the tree will automaticaly create the minimum amount of nodes required according by the schema

expendChoices

public java.util.ArrayList expendChoices
this hashmap keep trace of choices made by user when expanding the tree. It is usefull for example in case of saving/loading . It associate a path (String) to a name.

manageChoices

public boolean manageChoices
if this variable is set to true (by the constructor) while expanding a node that discribe a choice, the tree will give to the user the possibility to choose what element to expand. Else all possibility is displayed

schema

public org.exolab.castor.xml.schema.Schema schema
the schema

schemaFile

public java.io.File schemaFile
the xsl file describing the schema

schemaURL

public java.net.URL schemaURL

type for references used for going deeper in case of normalized document

autoduplicate - indicates that new nodes will be automaticly created according to the minimum defined in the schema (minOccurs)
